ygData.subject: Re: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I really couldn t agree more; I ve been in some groups where /assist-ing simply wasn t done, and I died(again!). I ve managed to find a good group now that
ygData.messageBody:
I really couldn't agree more; I've been in some groups where /assist-ing
simply wasn't done, and I died(again!). I've managed to find a good group
now that actually listens (!) to me. We've managed to take 4 bandits at once
with this song; I think that was what convinced them! Still, during a fight,
I say Assist the puller several times, just as a reminder.

Quies, Bard 15th Song
Karana

At 01:48 PM 1999-10-28 , you wrote:
>From: "Operaman" <slider@...>
>Everyone said OK. The very next nasty pull I typed MEZ and watched as
>everybody chose their favorite Orc and nobody assisted the puller. It was
>late so I said my goodbyes and shuffled home. I think it will take a
>situation where this song noticeably saves lives before people will be
>convinced. Next time I try it I'm going to make sure to Selo out of there if
>I don't see a lot of /assisting going on. It only hurts the bard to stay
>cause the mobs aren't going to leave him alone when they're awake.

>Operaman
>Meandering Maestro of the 17th Song
>Innoruuk

-- Jamie Furtner jfurtner@...
